text.title: TARA interactome
text.more:
This network represents all associations predicted for the TARA data set. 
The edge between a taxon pair can be indirect if both taxa respond to an environmental factor, such as phosphate. 
Edges that we classified as indirect with the help of the interaction information are colored in gray. 
A green edge represents a copresence (positive association), a red edge a mutual exclusion (negative association).
text.intro: TARA interactome - predicted associations between marine microbial taxa

legend.colorLabel: Pink = Bacteria, Blue = Eukaryota, Brown = Bacteriophages, Yellow = Archaea, Gray = Unknown domain
